description: Scientists have proposed a new class of stellar objects called “dark dwarfs,” sub-stellar bodies that may glow faintly from the energy released by annihilating dark matter particles. Found near the galaxy’s core, these objects could hold crucial clues about the elusive nature of dark matter. Powered not by fusion but by WIMP-like particles, dark dwarfs would retain lithium-7 in their atmospheres—providing a unique observational marker. Researchers believe telescopes like JWST may soon detect them, offering new evidence in the decades-long hunt for dark matter’s true identity.
title: Dark Dwarfs: New Star-Like Objects May Reveal Nature of Dark Matter

description: In a rare celestial event, NASA astronaut Nichole “Vapor” Ayers captured a vivid red sprite lightning phenomenon from the International Space Station as it flared above a thunderstorm across Mexico and the southern U.S. The image highlights the importance of orbital observation and NASA's citizen-science initiative, Spritacular, which collects public photos of Transient Luminous Events (TLEs). With only milliseconds to appear, these upper-atmosphere flashes remain one of Earth’s most mysterious natural occurrences, offering a glimpse into powerful storm dynamics and possible links to lightning on other planets.
title: NASA Astronaut Captures Rare Red Sprite Over Storm from Space Station

description: The Progress 92 spacecraft, launched by Roscosmos on July 4, 2025, has successfully docked with the International Space Station. The uncrewed cargo vehicle brought tons of food, fuel, equipment, and research materials to support the Expedition 73 crew.
title: Progress 92 Spacecraft Docks at ISS with Vital Supplies for Expedition 73

description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra in Titanium Blue features a 1.5-inch Super AMOLED display, a 47mm titanium case, and durability ratings of IP6X, 10ATM, and MIL-STD 810H. It supports dual-band GPS and an SOS siren. Health features include ECG, blood pressure, fall detection, Energy Score, and Antioxidant Index. Backed by a 590mAh battery, it is said to offer up to 48 hours in Exercise Power Saving Mode and up to 100 hours in complete Power Saving Mode.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra Now Available in a New Colour Variant in India

description: New astronomical breakthroughs have identified where the universe’s “missing” ordinary matter resides. Using 70 FRBs, including one from 9 billion light-years away, scientists discovered that 76% of ordinary matter exists between galaxies. A separate X-ray study observed an enormous hot gas filament connecting galaxy clusters.
title: Scientists Trace Universe’s Missing Ordinary Matter Using FRBs and X-rays

description: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 and Lava Blaze Dragon are confirmed to launch in India in July. The Lava Blaze Dragon is tipped to run on a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset. The Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 is said to feature a 6.67-inch AMOLED display. The upcoming phones are confirmed to be sold in the mid-range segment.
title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2, Blaze Dragon to Launch in India This Month

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 and Galaxy Watch 8 Classic were launched at the Galaxy Unpacked event on Wednesday. The Galaxy Watch 8 is available in 40mm and 44mm sizes, while the Galaxy Watch 8 Classic comes in a single 46mm variant. They are equipped with the Exynos W1000 chip.
title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy Watch 8, Watch 8 Classic With One UI 8.0 Watch, Exynos W1000 Chip Launched

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale is just three days away. The Seattle-based e-commerce giant’s annual subscriber-focused sale will begin at midnight on Friday, July 12, and will conclude three days later, on July 14. During this period, the company will offer heavy discounts on a large number of product categories, including smartphones, laptops, smartwatches, earphones, washing machines, air conditioners, and more.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Best Discounts on Washing Machines

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale is just three days away. The Seattle-based e-commerce giant’s annual subscriber-focused sale will begin at midnight on Friday, July 12, and will conclude three days later, on July 14. During this period, the company will offer heavy discounts on a large number of product categories, including smartphones, laptops, smartwatches, earphones, washing machines, air conditioners, and more.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Top Laptop Deals Are Here

description: Apple has been granted a patent for its next generation stylus that could feature a trackball tip and a few new sensors. This could potentially allow users to create content on multiple surfaces without needing to draw on a touch sensitive display. It is to be noted that the company is yet to officially reveal the details about such a pencil.
title: Apple Pencil With 'Trackball' Tip, Ability to Draw on Any Surface Described in Patent Document

description: The second Unpacked event of the year is here, bringing us the all-new Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. However, this year, Samsung has gone one step ahead to introduce a third foldable device in its portfolio - the Galaxy Flip 7 FE. The new model will serve as the entry point to the Galaxy foldable portfolio.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7: First Impressions

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE was launched at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event in New York on Wednesday. It sits below the flagship Galaxy Z Flip 7 in Samsung’s lineup of handsets with foldable form factors. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE is powered by an Exynos 2400 chipset. It comes with a 3.4-inch Super AMOLED cover screen, a dual rear camera unit, and support for Galaxy AI features. The phone has an IP48–rated build against dust and water ingress.
title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE With 3.4-inch Cover Display, Exynos 2400 SoC Launched

description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 features a 6.9-inch full-HD+ AMOLED foldable display and a 4.1-inch Super AMOLED cover screen, both with 120Hz refresh rates. Powered by an Exynos 2500 SoC, it offers 12GB RAM, up to 512GB inbuilt storage, and runs Android 16-based One UI 8. It includes 50-megapixel and 12-megapixel outward-facing cameras, a 10-megapixel selfie shooter, and AI tools like ProVisual Engine, Note Assist, and Now Bar. It packs a 4,300mAh battery and has an IP48-rated build.
title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy Z Flip 7 Launched in India With 4.1-Inch Cover Screen, Exynos 2500 SoC

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 was launched on Wednesday at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The new foldable runs on the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy processor. It has an 8-inch primary display and a 6.5-inch cover display. It has a triple rear camera unit led by a 200-megapixel primary sensor. It features a 4,400mAh battery.
title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy Z Fold 7 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset, 8-Inch Inner Display Launched in India

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale begins soon in India. It will be a three-day affair for the first time, taking place between July 12 and July 14. Ahead of the commencement of the annual sale, the e-commerce giant has revealed the deals on several affordable handsets that consumers can avail of. There are notable deals live on smartphones such as the OnePlus Nord CE 4 Lite, Redmi A4 5G, Lava Storm Play 5G, and more.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Deals on OnePlus Nord CE 4 Lite, Redmi A4 5G, Lava Storm Play 5G Announced

description: Apple appointed Sabih Khan as the company’s Chief Operating Officer on Tuesday. Khan, who currently serves as the Senior Vice President of Operations, will take the new position later this month, as the existing COO, Jeff Williams, transitions from the role. It is understood that Williams will continue to work in an advisory role and take retirement later this year.
title: Apple Appoints Indian-Origin Sabih Khan as New COO; Jeff Williams Shifts Focus to Apple Watch

description: Dreame has launched in India its F10 Robot Vacuum cleaner with a price of tag of Rs. 21,999. However, the robot vacuum will be available at an introductory price of Rs. 19,999 during the Amazon Prime Day Sale, from July 12 to 14. The vacuum cleaner packs a 5,200mAh battery that could deliver up to 300 minutes of run time.
title: Dreame F10 Robot Vacuum Cleaner Launched in India With 300 Minutes of Run Time: Price, Specifications

description: Facebook parent Meta acquired just under 3 percent of the Ray-Ban maker, a stake worth around €3 billion ($3.5 billion) at market prices, said the people, who asked not to be identified because deliberations are private.
title: Meta Invests $3.5 Billion in Ray-Ban Maker EssilorLuxottica in AI Glasses Push

description: Crews aboard the ISS carried out crucial biomedical research focused on immunity and muscle function in space. JAXA’s Takuya Onishi and the Ax-4 astronauts contributed to ongoing health studies, while engineers completed maintenance tasks and offloaded cargo from Progress 92. These activities mark another step forward in preparing humans for long-term space travel.
title: Axiom 4 Mission Crew Settles Down at ISS, Begins Conducting Biomedical Research

description: Gemini is now getting a new capability that will allow Google Home users to broadcast messages using the chatbot. The new feature was previewed last month as part of the new upgrades coming to the Google Home web app. It is now rolling out to users. The new feature also improves the integration between Gemini and the Google Home platform.
title: Gemini AI Upgraded to Support Google Home’s Broadcast Messages Feature

description: The Redmi 15C is expected to launch soon in at least four colours, including Midnight Black, Moonlight Blue, Twilight Orange, and a green option. Leaks suggest a redesigned rear panel with a square camera island. It is expected to get a 6.9-inch HD+ LCD screen and a 6,000mAh battery with 33W charging support. The handset has reportedly appeared on NBTC alongside the purported Poco C85. Both phones are expected to support only 4G connectivity.
title: Redmi 15C Leaked Renders Show Design, Colour Options; Reportedly Spotted on NBTC Site Alongside Poco C85

description: Samsung W26 foldable is said to be in the works as a successor to last year's Samsung W25, which was a rebranded Galaxy Z Fold Special Edition meant for China. Recently, the unannounced handset was reportedly spotted on China's Compulsory Certification (3C) website. The listing suggests that the phone will have 25W wired charging support.
title: Samsung W26 Foldable Phone Allegedly Spotted on China's 3C Site; Charging Speed Tipped

description: Naughty Dog has released a new free update for The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered that adds a chronological mode to the game, allowing players to experience the game's story in a new way. The free update is now available on PS5 and PC versions of the game.
title: The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered Gets New Free Update That Allows Players to Experience Story Chronologically

description: Grok reportedly ran wild on X (formerly known as Twitter) on Tuesday, making racist and hateful comments on posts. As per the report, the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot developed by Elon Musk’s xAI began generating less neutral responses after it was updated on Friday. However, on Tuesday, the chatbot was said to post comments that were racially charged and discriminatory.
title: Elon Musk’s Grok Chatbot Reportedly Made Racist and Hateful Posts on X, Later Deleted

description: Google Pixel 10 is expected to go official next month. Ahead of the formal launch, an alleged prototype Pixel 10 has appeared on a Chinese auction website. The listing includes renders of the phone and shows the Tensor G5 chipset and the motherboard.
title: Google Pixel 10 Prototype Appears on Auction Site, Shows Tensor G5 Chipset and Design

description: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked begins later today, and the company is likely to unveil three new foldable phones and the Galaxy Watch 8 series. The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, and Z Flip 7 FE are expected to make their debut. Samsung might also tease its first tri-fold smartphone at the event. Stay tuned to our blog for live coverage, on Samsung's foldable phones, smartwatches, and announcements related to One UI 8.
title: LIVE Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Flip 7 and More Expected to Debut

description: After fixing 67 security flaws in its June 2025 security update, Microsoft has now rolled out 137 security patches for Windows, including one publicly disclosed Zero-Day vulnerability in its July 2025 security update. The US-based tech giant has also fixed 14 critical vulnerabilities, two of which are AMD side channel attacks. The Zero-Day vulnerability was found to be in the Microsoft SQL server.
title: Microsoft Fixes One Zero-Day Vulnerability, 136 Other Flaws With July 2025 Windows Security Update

description: Tata Motors on Wednesday announced a collaboration with Dolby Laboratories in a move that will see the expansion of in-car entertainment solutions on the Harrier.ev. Dolby Atmos will soon be available, enabling consumers to experience the spatial audio technology on the electric vehicle (EV). It will complement Harman’s JBL Black audio system which the Tata Harrier.ev is equipped with, powered by an 8-channel amplifier and presented as a premium in-car entertainment solution.
title: Tata Motors Brings Dolby Atmos to Harrier.ev Powered by Harman JBL Black Audio System

description: AI video generators have become the craze ever since Google released its Veo 3 artificial intelligence (AI) model. With native audio support and realistic video generation, many netizens have started sharing interesting AI-generated videos on social media platforms. If you want to generate AI videos, but do not want to burn a hole in your pocket paying for the subscription, then you should check these best free AI video generators instead.
title: Best Free AI Video Generators in 2025: From Runway to Adobe Firefly, Check These Google Veo 3 Alternatives

description: Sony has announced a State of Play livestream, featuring a gameplay deep dive into Ghost of Yotei. The State of Play will be livestreamed on June 10 and will feature nearly 20 minutes of Ghost of Yotei gameplay.
title: Ghost of Yotei Is Getting a Gameplay Deep Dive at a State of Play Livestream This Week

description: Intel's upcoming Arrow Lake processor refresh could finally enable Microsoft Copilot+ features on desktop PCs in the coming months, according to a report. These AI features are currently limited to Copilot+ certified laptops, while the updated Arrow Lake CPUs are expected arrive with an upgraded neural processing unit (NPU) that will finally bridge the AI feature gap between desktop and laptop users.
title: Intel's Arrow Lake Refresh With Upgraded NPU to Bring Microsoft Copilot+ Features to Desktop PCs: Report

description: The iPhone 17 Air is expected to launch in September. Most recently, a video featuring an alleged dummy unit of the phone surfaced online, showcasing a black variant with a single rear camera. The design seen in the video is consistent with earlier iPhone 17 Air leaks.
title: iPhone 17 Air Dummy Unit Surfaces in Hands-on Video, Showcasing Thin Design

description: The Moto G96 5G features a 6.67-inch full-HD+ 144Hz 3D curved pOLED display with Gorilla Glass 5 protection. It gets a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, a 5,500mAh battery, and runs Android 15-based Hello UI. The phone has a 50-megapixel Sony Lytia 700C main rear camera, paired with an 8-megapixel ultrawide shooter. It gets a 32-megapixel front camera. The Moto G96 has an in-display fingerprint sensor and an IP68-rated dust and water-resistant build.
title: Moto G96 5G Launched in India With Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, 50-Megapixel Sony Lytia 700C Rear Camera

description: Realme 15 Series 5G is set to be launched in India on July 24. In the days leading up to its debut, the China-based OEM has been revealing several details about the top-end model in the lineup; the Realme 15 Pro 5G. The handset will be powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor, the company announced on Wednesday. It is also claimed to have an AnTuTu score of more than 1.1 million.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Confirmed to Get Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, GT Boost 3.0 for Gaming

description: Meta announced the roll out of Zoom’s standalone app on Tuesday. The app will allow users to be present during video conferences as their virtual avatars. According to the app’s listing on Meta’s website, Zoom’s standalone app will function with any paid or free Zoom license. This is in line with Zoom’s recent push to expand its presence in the virtual reality space. Zoom’s CEO, in June 2024, reportedly said that he wants AI clones in meetings.
title: Zoom, Meta Join Forces To Roll Out Standalone App for Its VR Headsets

description: Last month, Google silently dropped a new feature called Manage Subscriptions for Gmail’s web client. The tech giant has now officially announced its arrival on the web as well as additional platforms. The feature lets you view and manage your active subscriptions to all of the mailing lists and newsletters through a single window, eliminating the need to unsubscribe from each sender individually.
title: Gmail Announces Manage Subscriptions View for Decluttering Inbox on Android, iOS and Web

description: OnePlus Pad Lite is now available for pre-order in the UK and Europe, starting at GBP 169 (roughly Rs. 19,700). It features an 11-inch HD+ 90Hz LCD screen with TÜV Rheinland certifications. The tablet is backed by a MediaTek Helio G100 SoC coupled with up to 8GB of RAM and 128GB of inbuilt storage. It carries quad Hi-Res Audio speakers and a 9,340mAh battery with 33W fast charging support. It also supports facial recognition and weighs 530g.
title: OnePlus Pad Lite Launched With 11-Inch Display, 9,340mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Google on Wednesday rolled out the monthly software update for Pixel smartphones. It is based on Android 16 and is said to carry fixes for a couple of bugs discovered in previous iterations. Following the update, Pixel users can expect improved Wi-Fi connectivity and performance. Google said it is also the first Android 16 update for the Pixel 6a as part of the Battery Performance Programme, limiting the charging capabilities of the handset to minimise battery overheating risk.
title: Google Pixel Phones Receiving Android 16-Based Monthly Software Update for July 2025: What’s New

description: Phone 3 is the best yet from the house of Nothing, and as I mentioned in my first impressions, it is the first complete smartphone from the company. It has all the traits of a flagship smartphone, but due to its high pricing, it is a phone tough to recommend. The processor can handle everyday tasks and some gaming, but the Snapdragon 8 Elite at this price would have made more sense. The cameras and display are decent, but we have seen better in this price segment. Overall, it is a great first-gen flagship product from Nothing.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Review: Enters the Big League With a Big Price

description: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 is set to take place today, July 9. During the bi-annual event, the South Korean tech giant is speculated to introduce its latest generation of foldable smartphones, ubiquitously known as the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip 7. Now with Galaxy Unpacked 2025 on the horizon, here is how you can watch the event live and catch all the latest developments, along with the expected announcements.
title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Event Today: Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7 Launch Expected, How to Watch Livestream
